verses.verse: "Put the trumpet <WH7782> to your lips! <WH2441> Something like an eagle <WH5404> is over Yahweh <WH3068>'s house, <WH1004> because they have broken <WH5674> my covenant, <WH1285> and rebelled <WH6586> against my law. <WH8451>
They <WH3478> cry <WH2199> to me, <WH430> 'My God, we Israel acknowledge you! <WH3045>'
Israel <WH3478> has cast off <WH2186> that which is good. <WH2896> The enemy <WH341> will pursue him. <WH7291>

They have set up kings, <WH4427> but not by me. <WH7786> They have made princes, and I didn't <WH3045> approve. Of their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> they have made <WH6213> themselves idols, <WH6091> that they may be cut off. <WH3772>
Let Samaria <WH8111> throw <WH2186> out his calf <WH5695> idol! <WH639> My anger burns <WH2734> against them! <WH3808> How long will it be until they are capable <WH3201> of purity? <WH5356>
For this is even from Israel! <WH3478> The workman <WH2796> made <WH6213> it, <WH430> and it is no God; indeed, <WH5695> the calf of Samaria <WH8111> shall be broken in pieces. <WH7616>

For they sow <WH2232> the wind, <WH7307> and they will reap <WH7114> the whirlwind. <WH5492> He has no standing <WH7054> grain. <WH6780> The stalk will yield <WH6213> no head. <WH7058> If <WH194> it does yield, <WH6213> strangers <WH2114> will swallow it up. <WH1104>
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed up. <WH1104> Now they are among the nations <WH1471> like a worthless <WH2656> thing. <WH3627>
For they have gone up <WH5927> to Assyria, <WH804> like a wild donkey <WH6501> wandering alone. <WH909> Ephraim <WH669> has hired <WH8566> lovers for himself. <WH158>

But although they sold <WH8566> themselves among the nations, <WH1471> I will now gather <WH6908> them; <WH4592> and they begin to waste <WH2490> away because of the oppression <WH4853> of the king <WH4428> of mighty ones. <WH8269>
Because Ephraim <WH669> has multiplied <WH7235> altars <WH4196> for sinning, <WH2398> they became for him altars <WH4196> for sinning. <WH2398>
I wrote <WH3789> for him the many things <WH7230> of my law; <WH8451> but they were regarded <WH2803> as a strange thing. <WH2114>

As for the sacrifices <WH2076> of my offerings, <WH1890> they sacrifice <WH2077> flesh <WH1320> and eat <WH398> it; <WH3068> But Yahweh doesn't <WH7521> accept them. <WH2142> Now he will remember their iniquity, <WH5771> and punish <WH6485> their sins. <WH2403> They will return <WH7725> to Egypt. <WH4714>

For Israel <WH3478> has forgotten <WH7911> his Maker <WH6213> and built <WH1129> palaces; <WH1964> and Judah <WH3063> has multiplied <WH7235> fortified <WH1219> cities; <WH5892> but I will send <WH7971> a fire <WH784> on his cities, <WH5892> and it will devour <WH398> its fortresses. <WH759>"
